column2: "Da no ara na ɔhen Ahasuerus dze Haman
column4: ne fie maa ɔhembaa Ester. Na Modekai baa ɔhen no n'enyim; osiandɛ Ester aka mbrɛ ɔnye ne ntamu tse."

column2: "Na ɔhen no worɔɔw ne mpɛtsea a ɔgyee no Haman nsamu no
column3: na ɔdze maa Modekai. Na Ester dze Haman ne fie no hyɛɛ Modekai nsa."

column2: "Na Ester kasae wɔ ɔhen no n'enyim
column4: na ɔdze nyinsuwa totɔe serɛɛ no dɛ onyi Agagnyi Haman no mbusu na ne tsirmpɔw a ɔbɔɔ no wɔ Jewfo no ho no."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no tseen sika ahempoma no kyerɛɛ Ester. Nna Ester soɛree

column5: na asɛm no tsen wɔ ɔhen enyim
column6: na mo so miye wɔ n'enyiwa do a
column7: ɔno ma wɔnkyerɛw nkɛsan nwoma no a Agagnyi Haman
column9: bɔɔ no pɔw a ɔkyerɛɛw dɛ ɔdze rekɛsɛɛ Jewfo a wɔwɔ ɔhen n'amansin no nyinara mu no;"

column2: "na mebɛyɛ dɛn na metum atsena hɔ mahwɛ mbusu a ɔbɛba me man do? Na mebɛyɛ dɛn na metum atsena hɔ ahwɛ m'ebusuafo hɔn nsɛɛe?"
"Nna ɔhen Ahasuerus see ɔhembaa Ester na Jewnyi Modekai no dɛ
column3: Hwɛ medze Haman fi ama Ester na ɔnoara so wɔasɛn no wɔ dua no do
column4: ɔnam dɛ ɔdze ne nsa too Jewfo no do ntsi."

column6: na wɔdze ɔhen ne mpɛtsea asɔw ano no

column2: "Nna wɔfrɛfrɛɛ ɔhen n'akyerɛwfo no aber no mu
column3: bosoom a otsia ebiasa no a
column5: ne da a otsia eduonu ebiasa no mu: na wɔkyerɛɛw no dɛ mbrɛ Modekai hyɛe no nyinara dze kɛmaa Jewfo no
column6: na amansin do ahwɛfo na ambradofo na amansin mu mbapɔmba no a wɔwɔ India dze kodu Etiopia
column8: ɔmansin biara dɛ mbrɛ ne nkyerɛwee tse
column9: na ɔman biara dɛ mbrɛ hɔn kasaa tse
column10: na Jewfo no so dɛ mbrɛ hɔn nkyerɛwee na hɔn kasaa tse."
column11: "#8.9 SIVAN: Ɔtse dɛ Esusow Aketseaba mpaamu na Obiradzi mpaamu."

column2: "Na ɔdze ɔhen Ahasuerus ne dzin na ɔdze kyerɛwee na ɔdze ɔhen no ne mpɛtsea sɔɔw ano
column3: na ɔdze nwoma no somasomaa embirikatufo a wɔtsetse mpɔnkɔ do
column4: na wɔtsetse nsoasopɔnkɔ a hɔn ho yɛ har a wɔdze hɔn yɛ ɔhen n'edwuma no a wɔanyɛn hɔn mpɔnkɔban mu do:"

column2: "no mu na ɔhen no maa Jewfo a wɔwɔ kurow biara mu kwan dɛ wɔmpon hɔnho nhyia
column3: na hɔn nkwa ntsi wongyina hɔ
column6: na wɔmbɔ ɔman na ɔmansin a wobehiahia hɔn ho no
column11: "da kor mu wɔ ɔhen Ahasuerus n'amansin nyinara mu
column13: wɔ bosoom a otsia duebien no a ɔno nye bosoom Adar no
column14: ne da a otsia duebiasa no mu."

column2: "Nkyerɛwee no no nsusudo a wɔdze kɛhyɛɛ mbra no wɔ ɔmansin biara mu no
column3: wɔdaa no edzi maa aman nyinara
column4: dɛ Jewfo no nsiesie hɔnho nsie da no ma woeedzi hɔn atamfo wer."

column2: "Nna embirikatufo a wɔtsetse asoaso mpɔnkɔ a hɔn ho yɛ har a wɔdze hɔn yɛ ɔhen n'edwuma no do no
column3: wɔnam ɔhen ne mbrasɛm do sii mu kɔree; na mbra no wɔhyɛɛ no wɔ Susa ahemfie."

column2: "Na Modekai fiir edzi fii ɔhen no enyim dɛ ɔhyɛ ahentar bibir na fufuw
column4: na ɔnye ndwera fɛɛfɛw na ɔberdum bataker: na Susa kurow no dzii ehurusi na hɔn enyi gyee."

column2: "Na Jewfo no nyaa kan na enyigye

column3: beebiara mbrɛ ɔhen no ne mbrasɛm na no mbra no durii no
column4: Jewfo no nyaa enyigye na ahosɛpɛw
column5: aponto na da pa dzi. Na asaase no do aman no mu nyimpa dodowara bɛyɛɛ Jewfo; osiandɛ Jewfo no ho suro aka hɔn."
